gear.name: fsl-topup
gear.label: FSL: TOPUP correction for susceptibility induced distortions
gear.description: Estimates a distortion correction field given one or more pairs of images with opposite PE directions
gear.author: FSL

image_1.description: first image in an pair of images with opposite phase encoding direction

image_2.description: second image in an pair of images with opposite phase encoding direction

apply_to_1.description: an image to apply the TOPUP correction to using this fieldmap.  Should have the same PE direction as image 1

apply_to_2.description: an image to apply the TOPUP correction to using this fieldmap.  Should have the same PE direction as image 2

config_file.description: A configuration file is a text file containing some or all of the parameters that can be specified for topup. The name of the file should be passed as argument to the --config parameter. It should be an ascii-file with one row for each parameter, and where comments (ignored by topup) are preceeded by a #.

acquisition_parameters.description: This parameter specifies a text-file that contains information about how the volumes were acquired.  Row 1 is for image 1, row 2 is for image 2
